content.json: **NOTE**: This workbook depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**Cloudflare**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-CloudflareDataConnector-parse) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL
| summarize count() by ClientDeviceType_s
content.title: Traffic Type

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL
| summarize count() by ClientRequestProtocol_s
content.title: HTTP Protocols

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL
| summarize count() by ClientRequestMethod_s
content.title: Request Methods

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL
| extend EdgeResponseContentType = iif(isempty(EdgeResponseContentType_s),"empty",EdgeResponseContentType_s )
| summarize count() by EdgeResponseContentType
content.title: Content Types

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL
| summarize Count=count() by ClientRequestURI_s
| sort by Count | project-rename ClientRequestURI=ClientRequestURI_s | take 50
content.title: Top Requested URIs

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL
| summarize Count=count() by ClientIP_s
| sort by Count | take 50 | project-rename  ClientIP=ClientIP_s
content.title: Top Traffic IPs

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL
| extend ClientRequestReferer = iif(isempty(ClientRequestReferer_s),"empty",ClientRequestReferer_s )
| summarize Count=count() by ClientRequestReferer
| sort by Count | take 50
content.title: Top Referer

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL
| summarize Count=count() by ClientIPClass_s | project-rename ClientIPClass=ClientIPClass_s
| sort by Count | take 50
content.title: Top Traffic Types

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL
| summarize Count=count() by ClientRequestUserAgent_s | project-rename ClientRequestUserAgent=ClientRequestUserAgent_s
| sort by Count | take 50
content.title: Top User Agents

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL 
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc_s =="user" and EdgePathingOp_s == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="bic" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc_s=="protect" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")
| where isnotempty(threat)
| summarize Count=count() by threat
content.title: Top Threats
Requests vs Threats

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL 
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc_s =="user" and EdgePathingOp_s == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="bic" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc_s=="protect" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")
| where isnotempty(threat)
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain};
content.title: Threats Over Time

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL 
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc_s =="user" and EdgePathingOp_s == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="bic" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc_s=="protect" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")
| where isnotempty(threat)
| summarize count() by ClientCountry_s | project-rename Country=ClientCountry_s | take 20
content.title: Top Threat Countries

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL 
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc_s =="user" and EdgePathingOp_s == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="bic" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc_s=="protect" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")
| where isnotempty(threat)
| summarize count() by ClientIP_s | project-rename ClientIP=ClientIP_s

| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc_s =="user" and EdgePathingOp_s == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="bic" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc_s=="protect" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL 
| extend threat=case(EdgePathingSrc_s =="user" and EdgePathingOp_s == "ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s has "ip" ,"IP Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry","Country Block",EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="zl", "Routed by Zone Lockdown", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ua", "Blocked User Agent", EdgePathingSrc_s=="user" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="rateLimit", "Blocked by Rate Limiting", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Blocked by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="filterBasedFirewall" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl", "Challenged by Filter Based Firewall", EdgePathingSrc_s=="bic" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="unknown", "Browser Integrity Check", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ctry", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="hot" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="ip", "Blocked Hotlink", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaErr", "CAPTCHA Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaFail", "CAPTCHA Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="captchaNew", "New CAPTCHA", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlErr", "Java Script Challenge Error", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlFail", "Java Script Challenge Failed", EdgePathingSrc_s=="macro" and EdgePathingOp_s=="chl" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="jschlNew", "New Java Script Challenge", EdgePathingSrc_s=="protect" and EdgePathingOp_s=="ban" and EdgePathingStatus_s=="17ddos", "L7 DDos Mitigation","")
| where isnotempty(threat)
| summarize Count=count() by EdgePathingStatus_s | project-rename EdgePathingStatus=EdgePathingStatus_s
content.title: Top Threat User Agents

content.query:
let 5xx = Cloudflare_CL 
| where tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "5"
| summarize Count=count()
| extend title="5xx Errors (Edge)";

let 4xx = Cloudflare_CL 
| where tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "4"
| summarize Count=count()
| extend title="4xx Errors (Edge)";

let 3xx = Cloudflare_CL 
| where tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "3"
| summarize Count=count()
| extend title="3xx Errors (Edge)";

let result_table = union 5xx, 4xx, 3xx; 
result_table 
| sort by Count
content.title: ERRORS Counts (Edge)

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL 
| extend response_error_type= case(tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "2" , "2xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "3" , "3xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "4" , "4xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "5" , "5xx","")
| where isnotempty(response_error_type)
| summarize Count=count() by response_error_type
content.title: Edge Response Error Ratio

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL 
| extend response_error_type= case(tostring(OriginResponseStatus_d) startswith "2" , "2xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus_d) startswith "3" , "3xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus_d) startswith "4" , "4xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus_d) startswith "5" , "5xx","")
| where isnotempty(response_error_type)
| summarize Count=count() by response_error_type
content.title: Origin Response Error Ratio

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL 
| extend response_error_type= case(tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "2" , "2xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "3" , "3xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "4" , "4xx", tostring(EdgeResponseStatus_d) startswith "5" , "5xx","")
| where isnotempty(response_error_type)
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by response_error_type;
content.title: Edge Response Status Over Time

content.query:
Cloudflare_CL 
| extend response_error_type= case(tostring(OriginResponseStatus_d) startswith "2" , "2xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus_d) startswith "3" , "3xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus_d) startswith "4" , "4xx", tostring(OriginResponseStatus_d) startswith "5" , "5xx","")
| where isnotempty(response_error_type)
| make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by response_error_type;
content.title: Origin Response Status Over Time
